code: import React from'react';import{motion}from'framer-motion';import{Zap,TrendingUp,Battery,Cpu}from'lucide-react';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const UpgradeShop=()=>{const upgrades=[{id:1,name:'Miner Level 2',description:'Increase hashrate to 200 H/s',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Cpu,{size:24}),cost:'0.1 TON',benefit:'+100 H/s',type:'miner'},{id:2,name:'Energy Boost',description:'Increase energy capacity to 1500',icon:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Battery,{size:24}),cost:'0.05 TON',benefit:'+500 Energy',type:'energy'}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"upgrade-shop",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"shop-header",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Upgrade Shop"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:"Enhance your mining capabilities"})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"upgrades-grid",children:upgrades.map(upgrade=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(motion.div,{className:"upgrade-card",whileHover:{scale:1.02},whileTap:{scale:0.98},children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"upgrade-icon",children:upgrade.icon}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:upgrade.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:upgrade.description}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"upgrade-benefit",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TrendingUp,{size:16}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{children:upgrade.benefit})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"upgrade-btn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:["Upgrade for ",upgrade.cost]})})]},upgrade.id))})]});};export default UpgradeShop;
